title: iZombie, Vol. 3: Six Feet Under and Rising
description: The continuing adventures of the undead detective Gwen and her ghost pal Ellie and were-terrier Spot, written by World Fantasy Award finalist Chris Roberson! This collection features the "real-time" storyline "5 Brains, 5 Months," which follows the team as they uncover mystery after mystery over the course of a five-month period.Collects issues #13-17
author: Chris Roberson
